comment: Ruti is a wonderful teacher! She is incredibly kindhearted toward her students and wants all to succeed. You will spend most of Biblical Hebrew reading Genesis 1 & 2 in Hebrew & will be surprised how you've learned by the end. She brings a special language and culture to KSU. Anyone with an interest should take her classes.
She is the literal best! Enough said.

rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Hilarious

comment: Ruti is awesome!  I had her for Hebrew 1101! A plus side is she actually knows the language unlike some  other foreign language professors! I love her and she treats all of her students like her own. Another plus is she really wants her students to do well and goes at the pace the class needs to really learn and understand the language.

TAKE HER!!! she's very helpful, she makes the language very easy, arabic is my first language so it was easy for me to learn it(arabic and hebrew are quiet similar), but still she tries so hard to explain everything, and willing to stop the lecture to answer a question. make sure you attend every class,and keep up with everything she hands to you.

Took her 4 Biblical Hebrew. She wants all her students to make an A.Grades based on improvement,class attendance, reading out-loud n class (easy)do the hw its easy. Final was open book & notes so,save all your hw & notes. Quizzes easy. She is fun & goes with the pace of the class. Gives handouts for tests with 1/2 the answers to the tests on it!

BEST Professor I have ever had in my academic career. She teaches and explains anything that you ask. She will meet you outside of class and go through the material if you need extra guidance. I love my Morah! Study and ask questions. She wants every student to make an A, and learn as much Hebrew as possible. :)
The best professor in the whole world. She really cares about all her students and take the time to make sure they are learning.

I absolutely adore Ruthi! She is fun and funny, and she really wants her students to learn and to care about the hebrew language. I have more fun in this class than in any other. If you desire to learn hebrew, I highly recommend Ruthi. She is Sababa!!textbook:Brandeis Modern Hebrew (Hebrew Edition)
